Acer Aspire One with NetBSD 5.0

May 23, 2009

Finished installing NetBSD 5.0 on my AspireOne, here’s the output from dmesg.

I’m writing up some notes on how the install went and special things I needed to do to get hardware working which I’ll be posting sometime over the weekend.
